headline: Waste Sorting Equipment Market to Hit USD 1585.10 Million by 2032, Fueled by Urbanization and Automation in Recycling Technologies | Research by SNS Insider
summary: Growing landfill scarcity and rapid AI integration boost demand for advanced waste sorting systems, improving efficiency and recycling quality.Austin, July 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Waste Sorting Equipment Market Size was valued at USD 963.45 million in 2024 and is expected to reach USD 1585.10 million by 2032, growing at a CAGR of 6.42% over the forecast period of 2025-2032. headline: 1 Magnificent S&P 500 Dividend Stock to Buy for a Lifetime of Passive Income
summary: Waste Management may be the epitome of a steady-Eddie business.  Waste Management raised its dividend payments by 10% this year, and there should be plenty more increases on the way.  One of my personal favorites is North America's largest trash and recycling juggernaut, Waste Management (NYSE: WM).
